spanGrp.span: The difference between our language and Russian was not that big before.
bizım halhınan da urus dilın halhın raznitsasi iräldän vabše eč čoğ dutmierdi
1.PL -GEN people -INSTR and Russian language -GEN people -GEN difference -POSS.3 before -ABL generally at.all many keep -NEG -IPFV -PST
If you ask an old man he can speak a well amount of other languages.
onučun ki iräldän böyük adamlara ki sorsan onnar čisti söilierlär özgä dil
because that before -ABL old man -PL -DAT that ask -COND -2.SG 3 -PL clean speak -IPFV -PL other language
Difficult words eventually get lost and we say Russian words instead of Urum.
bizım halh savremenem o dillär o sözlär va čätın sözlär itir o sözlärın erınä biz dabavlit ederıh russki sözlär
1.PL -GEN people avantually that language -PL that word -PL HESIT difficult word -PL loose that word -PL -GEN place -POSS.3 -DAT 1.PL add do -AOR -1.PL russian word -PL
That’s why sometimes we use Russian words.
onučunda ki oler bazi sözdä urus sözi
because -and that be -AOR some word -and Russian word -POSS.3
It was not like that before.
But nowadays when our children went to Russian school they mixed Russian with Urum.
ama šindiki vahıt biräz ki ušahlar urus školasına getti urus šeinä ğarıšti urus russki yazık bizım dilä
but now -COMP time little that child -PL Russian school -POSS.3 -DAT go -PST Russian that -DAT mix -PST Russian russian language 1.PL -GEN language -DAT
